title: Unable to launch the client?
body: I've clicked on the icon multiple times. the logo pops up, fades...and then nothing. Doesnt launch.

replies.body: This can happen sometimes if you haven't quite fully set up the right permissions to allow League to launch normally. Luckily this is easily fixed up by following the steps in this handy [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).
